title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.8 - Exempt records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.8 - Exempt records

State Regulations

Records of information which is exempted by statute, confidentially disclosed, constituting an unwarranted invasion of personal
privacy or constituting part of investigatory files and as otherwise more
specifically described in section 88(7) of said article shall not be made
available for inspection or copying; identifying details may be deleted for
specified records which are to be made available pursuant to section 88(3) of
said article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1500.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
